video_identification.title: Rabbi Avi Dabush - The Sanctity of Life

extracted_metadata.title: Rabbi Avi Dabush - The Sanctity of Life
extracted_metadata.description: The return of the hostages home is the distillation of the most important value in Judaism - the sanctity of life This is a moment of immense relief, but also of reflection. The sanctity of life is not just a Jewish value - it is a moral imperative: to choose life, every life, always. Not one life over another, not one people over another - but the sanctity of life simply as life. Watch and share what the organizationâ€™s CEO, Rabbi Avi Dabush, said yesterday in an interview with Kan 11.
